entities.name: owlery
entities.description: The room where hundreds of owls are nesting on rafters. The text describes it as having glassless windows and a vaulted ceiling.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, described as being near the top of the vaulted ceiling, with great white wings.

relationships.description: The text describes Harry entering the Owlery and spotting Hedwig inside.
Hedwig is described as being on Harry's shoulder, indicating a close relationship between them.
